column4: how long does it take for ubuntu one to sync? is there a "force sync now" button?
i like empathy :d
may i ask why?????/
why not? it does what i need it to do, it's deeply tied with gnome, i can store my passwords in the gnome keychain, and it doesnt crash like pidgin does :/
i guess for you its good enough...but i couldnt even change fonts there... i hate it.
maybe later it'll get better... but right now its not good enough.. at least for me.
features are sparse, i agree, but what do you want to use in particular that empathy doesnt have? besides video)
IRC didnt work for me..
does it work for you??
i don't use those sort of chat clients for IRC... i usually want something a little more specialized
all i do in IRC is type something and press enter so i dont really need much... but like i said.. it didnt even work..
that's weird... it shouldn't just "not work"
maybe check on the forums if other users are experiencing a similar problem?
nah... i cant even change fonts with empathy.. its not worth the effort for me.... maybe when its more mature.
what are you talking about?
im just talking about how karmic some issues for some ppl myself included.... (some ppl being the key phrase.. no fan boy crap please...)
a lot of ppl say that.. i guess that makes it ok.

just pointing out that its expected, keep in mind that while ubuntu is canonical sponsored, the majority of the developers are working from their OWN time, this is a volunteer project, its pretty amazing we even have something like this community to begin with
im not saying its complete crap.. but it sucks that some ppl cant even automount CD/DVDs and have to do it manually... and mice not working among other things. thats all...
are you a windows hater? lol
go fix it :) if you see a bug, post a bug
no fyi, I am not, but I do believe in being proactive in the community, lets get back on subject, if you want to continue this discussion go to #ubuntu-offtopic
if i could fix it i would.. i really would... but sadly i cant.. all i can do is post bugs and help out here or things like that.
well thats enough, posting bugs are important
